author: hydrochief
title: Great for the holidays!
review: I got this set for free by buying 50$ worth of Lego at a Toys R Us.  As my first Lego magnet, I was quite happy to receive it.  Upon opening the package, the first thing I noticed was the cheaper quality of the plastic used to make Santa, especially on his head.  The head was actually a slightly different yellow than regular minifig heads!  While this is unfortunate, I sort of expected lower quality from a free promotional set. The build was (obviously) extremely easy, but I still enjoyed putting it together, mostly because of the new magnet element (which I never had before). The main complaint I have with this set is that I can actually see a bit of Santa's mouth poking out of his beard (when his smile should be covered completely covered) which makes it look like Santa has a black moustache.  However, I'm sure this was just a printing error, and it probably doesn't occur to often.  While it is simple, the Santa Magnet is a great addition to holiday decorations, and I hope more holiday magnets will be produced.
